body:
If I revert the code but keep the regression test, then I get the same error, so it hasn't been fixed yet.

```ruby
  1) Failure:
HasOneAssociationsTest#test_has_one_transaction [test/cases/associations/has_one_associations_test.rb:509]:
2 instead of 0 queries were executed.
Queries:
SAVEPOINT active_record_1
RELEASE SAVEPOINT active_record_1.
Expected: 0
  Actual: 2
```

I tried searching the issues for other pull requests that fix this and didn't find any.  A similar issue was fixed on the collection_association in commit fa8dfad7654baa831c8de515118008b3382df515, and commit 3cb0f3feed7130225cc169c2b1476acf0b11e066 fixed an empty transaction when building a has_one association.
